name: test_e2e_with_logs[259_CMD_ADV_063]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_ADV_063` |
| **Name** | Pipe Cat Passwd |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `| cat /etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%7C%20cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~16000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:47:48.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMD_ADV_063-1769863668492-cwg8lo pattern_id=CMD_ADV_063 uri=/?q=%7C%20cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMD_ADV_063-1769863668492-cwg8lo pattern_id=CMD_ADV_063 uri=/?q=%7C%20cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1
